name: Everything is Fine (TheGlitch, biig, Brian Francis Majewski, Under Grawlix, jerrytjohn)
name_original: Everything is Fine (TheGlitch, biig, Brian Francis Majewski, Under Grawlix, jerrytjohn)
description:
A simple platformer where you try to win love and affection of Princess Pucker.

Navigate Onion Boy using arrow keys or WASD and go on an adventure through a wonderful game where Everything is Fine.
